long_description: The Swix FX waxing iron is compact and lightweight, and features a broad base plate for working on skis and snowboards. Designed for snowboards and freeride skis, the Swix FX waxing iron features a wide surface to efficiently apply wax to today's wide products. Control light comes on and off regularly to indicate that the temperature is being properly maintained. Control knob makes it easy to dial in the temperature to melt your wax without sending it up in smoke. Built-in heel rest lets you position the iron to cool when you're finished. 850W element offers temperatures between 100deg and 150degC. Weighs approximately 23 oz.
short_description: The Swix FX waxing iron is compact and lightweight, and features a broad base plate for working on skis and snowboards.
